meanings.sent1: The color of the walls was nonrelevant to the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The extra information was nonrelevant to the main topic.
meanings.sent3: The clown's hat was nonrelevant to his oversized shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her loud laughter was nonrelevant to the somber atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies was nonrelevant to the math lesson.

meanings.definition: Not connected or related to the matter at hand.
meanings.sent1: The old photo on the wall was nonrelevant to the new furniture.
meanings.sent2: The weather report was nonrelevant to the sports news.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow was nonrelevant to the dog's bark.
meanings.sent4: His sudden outburst was nonrelevant to the calm discussion.
meanings.sent5: The smell of flowers was nonrelevant to the city street.
